alfredsnippet.snippet:
https://books.google.com/books?vid=ISBN186094079X&id=e4yupcOzJxkC&pg=PP1&lpg=PP1&ots=6xtjT18iOQ&dq=plasma+99%25+universe&sig=i96aK5VoNeZsM9B3rN7igy2umyE#v=onepage&q=plasma%2099%25%20universe&f=false

Basic Space Plasma Physics

"While only a few natural plasmas, such as flames or lightning strokes, can be found near the Earth's surface, plasmas are abundant in the universe. More than 99% of all known matter is in the plasma state."

https://books.google.com/books?vid=ISBN9812381554&id=v99GV71BNccC&pg=PA14&lpg=PA14&ots=nyCdxEoDvA#v=onepage&q&f=false

Analytical and Numerical Methods for Wave Propagation in Fluid Media

"It is estimated that as much as 99.9% of the universe is comprised of plasma."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Plasma is 99% of Observable Matter - Part 7
